meanings.definition: A person or animal that devours something.
meanings.sent1: The hungry lion was one of the devourers in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The pack of wolves were known as the devourers of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The little girl jokingly called her big brother a cookie devourer.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were like devourers, consuming the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The devourers of knowledge eagerly read every book in the library.
